hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
sudo apt-get update -y && sudo apt-get install -y wget texinfo make autoconf ant openjdk-8-jdk git libtool autogen zip sudo wget -q -O - https://pkg.jenkins.io/debian/jenkins-ci.org.key | sudo apt-key add - sudo sh -c 'echo deb http://pkg.jenkins.io/debian-stable binary/ > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/jenkins.list' sudo apt-get update -y
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-s390x export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
sudo apt-get install -y jenkins sudo service jenkins stop
sudo rm -rf /var/cache/jenkins/war cp /usr/share/jenkins/jenkins.war /tmp/ cd /tmp jar -xvf jenkins.war WEB-INF/lib/jna-4.2.1.jar wget http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/net/java/dev/jna/jna/4.5.0/jna-4.5.0.jar -O WEB-INF/lib/jna-4.5.0.jar jar -uvf jenkins.war WEB-INF/lib/jna-4.5.0.jar jar -xvf jenkins.war META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
##Modify the META-INF/MANIFEST.MF cat -n ./META-INF/MANIFEST.MF sudo sed -i '10,$d' ./META-INF/MANIFEST.MF cat -n ./META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
jar -uvf jenkins.war META-INF/MANIFEST.MF jar -uvfm jenkins.war META-INF/MANIFEST.MF zip -d jenkins.war META-INF/JENKINS.SF zip -d jenkins.war META-INF/JENKINS.RSA zip -d jenkins.war WEB-INF/lib/jna-4.2.1.jar sudo cp jenkins.war /usr/share/jenkins/jenkins.war
sudo service jenkins start sudo apt-cache policy jenkins|grep -i installed
